## ITQ Phase 2 for Data Collection Modernization (DCM) - COTS Software Product Supplier

### Notice of a Request for Information (RFI) and Invitation to Qualify

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing an Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) for Phase 2 of Data Collection Modernization (DCM) - COTS Software Product Supplier, on behalf of Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI).

**Procurement Details**

* **Reference Number:**WS4105045039-Doc4432356178
* **Amendment Number:**4
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4105045039
* **Publication Date:** February 6, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 4, 2024 @ 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** February 26, 2024

### Procurement Category and Method

The procurement category is *SRV (Services) and the procurement method is *Competitive - Open Bidding.

### Procurement Objectives

PWGSC is seeking a COTS Software Product Supplier for Phase 2 of the DCM initiative. The objective of this procurement is to provide COTS software solutions to support OSFI's requirements.

### Eligibility and Qualification

This RFI/ITQ is open to all qualified suppliers. Suppliers must be able to provide COTS software solutions that meet or exceed OSFI's requirements.

### Obligations and Expectations

The chosen supplier must be prepared to deliver high-quality COTS software solutions that meet all regulatory requirements and OSFI's standards.

### Qualification and Evaluation Methodology

The evaluation criteria will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Request for Information

Suppliers are invited to provide information on their technical and commercial capabilities to deliver the COTS software solutions. This RFI/ITQ is open to all interested suppliers, and responses must be submitted through SAP Ariba: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18725530

### Contact Information

For any clarification or information requests, please contact Melanie Beauvais Lefort, Section Head, Telecommunications Services, PWGSC:
Email: [melanie.beauvaislefort@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.beauvaislefort@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
